Package databaseManagement

Class UserInformation

java.lang.Object
databaseManagement.UserInformation
public class UserInformation
extends java.lang.Object
This class can upload , download user's registration information.

Complete profile along with events can be deleted by using this class.

Author:
Muhammad Obaid Ullah , Syed Adil Ehsan , Rao Shahan Naveed

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UserInformation()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleleProfile​(java.lang.String username)
    This function finds the profile from database that is to be deleted.
    void delete_from_events​(java.lang.String username)
    This function deletes the events booked on given username.
    void delete_from_file​(int id)
    This function deletes the files uploaded on all events of given id.
    void delete_from_participants​(int id)
    This function deletes all participants added on given id.
    void delete_from_users​(java.lang.String username)
    This function deletes the user data of given username.
    void downloadInformation()
    This function can read user's information from the database and put it in the required table in GUI.
    void update_info​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstname, java.lang.String lastname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
    This function updates an already existing profile.
    void uploadInfo​(java.lang.String usrN, java.lang.String fN, java.lang.String lN, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
    This function uploads user's data in regitser_user table of the database.

  • Method Details

    • uploadInfo

      public void uploadInfo​(java.lang.String usrN, java.lang.String fN, java.lang.String lN, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function uploads user's data in regitser_user table of the database.
      Parameters:
      usrN - username entered by user.
      fN - first name of the user.
      lN - last name of the user.
      email - email address of the user.
      password - password entered by the user.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • downloadInformation

      public void downloadInformation() throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function can read user's information from the database and put it in the required table in GUI.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • deleleProfile

      public void deleleProfile​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function finds the profile from database that is to be deleted.
      Parameters:
      username - profile id of the user that is to be deleted.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • delete_from_events

      public void delete_from_events​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function deletes the events booked on given username.
      Parameters:
      username - user's profile id that is to be deleted.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • delete_from_users

      public void delete_from_users​(java.lang.String username) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function deletes the user data of given username.
      Parameters:
      username - user's profile id that is to be deleted.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • delete_from_file

      public void delete_from_file​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function deletes the files uploaded on all events of given id.
      Parameters:
      id - event id.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • delete_from_participants

      public void delete_from_participants​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function deletes all participants added on given id.
      Parameters:
      id - event id.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.

    • update_info

      public void update_info​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String firstname, java.lang.String lastname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      This function updates an already existing profile.
      Parameters:
      username - Profile's username.
      firstname - Profile's first name.
      lastname - Profile's first name.
      email - Profile's email.
      password - Profile's password.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - Sql connectivity and command errors will be checked.
